contract_description: This Procurement Contract (the "Contract") is entered into between Lakshmi Automobile, hereinafter referred to as the "Supplier," and Plasma Corporation, hereinafter referred to as the "Buyer."
objective: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Bus, Car, Bike.
scope: Supplier Name: Lakshmi Automobile Address: 456 Oak Avenue, Cityville, USA Contact Person: Jane Doe Email: jane@xyzsuppliers.com Phone: +1-987-654-3210
Product/Service Description: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Bus, Car, Bike.

Volume Discounts: The Buyer and the Supplier agree to the following volume discounts based on the cumulative purchase volume during the Contract term: 100 units - 500 units: 7% discount, 501 units - 1000 units: 12% discount, Over 1000 units: 18% discount.
Pricing: The pricing for the products/services shall be as follows: Bus: $15 per unit, Car: $25 per unit, Bike: $35 per unit.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Pricing: The pricing for the products/services shall be as follows: Bus: $15 per unit, Car: $25 per unit, Bike: $35 per unit. Payment Terms: The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 45 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payment Method: Payments shall be made via PayPal, as agreed upon by both parties.
delivery_terms: Invoicing: The Supplier shall submit invoices to the Buyer for the products/services provided as per the agreed-upon pricing and terms.
termination_clause: Termination for Convenience: Either party may terminate this Contract with 60 days written notice to the other party. Termination for Cause: Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
